英国科学家公布了世界领先的技术，以加快药物发现产生类似人类组织的新型3D生物总结具有彻底改变新药物的癌症，心脏病和关节炎的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/british-scientists-unveil-world-leading-technology-to-speed-peed-peed-peed-prug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/british-scientists-unveil-world-world-leading-technology-to-speed-up-up-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=349482b4-4263-4263-4c17-acc0-44626232e3ed Mon, 10 Mar 2025 07:55:00 -0400 British scientists unveil world-leading technology to speed up drug discovery
RCSI研究发现免疫细胞“记忆”可以在炎症后很长时间增加血液凝块的风险RCSI医学与健康科学大学的新研究发现，过去的炎症事件“记住”的白细胞迅速反应过度，从而增加了血液血块的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/rcsi-study-finds-mmmune-cell-e28098memoriesee28099-can-increase-the---危险 - 危险 - 弗洛斯 - 弗洛斯 - clots-clots-clots-flots-flots-after-fer-after-inflym-Inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/RCSI-study-finds-immune-cell-e28098memoriese28099-can-increase-the-risk-for-blood-clots-long-after-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96C87F30-4EC7-4228-8936-C2C96CC605A6 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 07:54:00 -0400 RCSI study finds immune cell ‘memories’ can increase the risk for blood clots long after inflammation
对次磷酸患者牙齿问题的新见解下磷酸是一种相对常见的骨骼疾病，主要影响骨骼和牙齿强度。在最近发表在《科学报告》上的第三次全国性次磷酸调查中，研究人员分析了日本患者迄今为止最大的调查中面临的牙齿问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-insights-into-dento-problems-in-hypophatapatasia-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-insights-into-dento-problems-in-hypophatapatasia-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=255650E1-6FEE-4FE4FE4-9F5D-EE70E6C83F8C Mon, 10 Mar 2025 07:10:11 -0400 New insights into dental problems in hypophosphatasia patients

数以百万计的美国生活在医生不练习和远程医疗的地方芭芭拉·威廉姆斯（Barbara Williams）厨房的无线路由器上闪烁着绿灯。只有一个酒吧照亮了 - 一个薄弱的信号将她与阿拉巴马州黑带的家之外的世界联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/millions-in--in-us-live-in-where-where-doctors-done28099t-practice-and-practice-and-telehealth-doesne280999t-rach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/millions-in--in-us-live-in-where-where-where-doctors-done28099t-practice-and-practice-and-telehealth-doesne280999t-rach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4E312C0C-7872-4447-8AC2-4FE9B989C2D4 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 06:52:50 -0400 Millions in US live in places where doctors don’t practice and telehealth doesn’t reach
FDA如何让化学品倒入美国的食物供应约瑟夫·谢伊（Joseph Shea）在南卡罗来纳州默特尔比奇（Myrtle Beach）出售运动服，对自己吃的食物感到惊讶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/how-the-the-the-the-the-the-the-fda-remicals-vemicals-pour-into-into-americaeae28099s-food-supply.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/how-the-the-the-the-the-the-the-the-fda-remicals-vemicals-pour-into-into-americae28099s-food-supply.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d69c0d97-f9fe-4812-b021-d95c0df5e00b Mon, 10 Mar 2025 06:44:32 -0400 How the FDA lets chemicals pour into America’s food supply
低精液质量与较短的寿命相关研究人员确定精液质量如何影响死亡率风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/low-semen-quality-linked-to-shorter-lifespan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/low-semen-quality-linked-to-shorter-lifespan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0A3E0D8-1EDD-40B5-B870-2C5EC7FB1CC4 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 04:48:00 -0400 Low semen quality linked to shorter lifespan
为什么有些人需要补品而其他人不需要补品？新评论解释《新英格兰医学杂志》中的新研究回顾了有关微量营养素需求，缺陷和干预措施的当前知识。它强调了需要补充有针对性的补充，并呼吁进行高级研究以更好地诊断和治疗隐藏的缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/why-do-some-people-need-supplements-and-others-done28099t-new-review-eview-explains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/why-do-some-people-need-supplements-and-others-done28099t-new-review-review-explains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A6E8FB80-FC73-43F2-A9A5-F67A925FB672 Sun, 09 Mar 2025 23:43:00 -0400 Why do some people need supplements and others don’t? New review explains
如何选择更健康的无麸质面包与含麸质的纤维相比，无麸质（GF）面包和面粉通常含有较少的天然纤维和更多的脂肪，含有较高的饱和脂肪的成本，添加了木座或牙龈促进纤维。研究人员敦促更好的配方将GF饮食的营养品质与传统选择相匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/how-to-to-pick-healthier-gluten-free-bread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/how-to-to-pick-healthier-gluten-free-bread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89370af4-b3CA-47EC-8622-8622-8D306225CFEF Sun, 09 Mar 2025 22:07:00 -0400 How to pick healthier gluten-free bread
GLP-1药物可能降低2型糖尿病患者的白血病和淋巴瘤的风险研究人员发现，GLP-1受体激动剂（GLP-1RAS）显着降低了2型糖尿病患者中几种血液癌的风险，尤其是与胰岛素相比。该研究还强调了GLP-1RA作为癌症保护的潜力，与葡萄糖控制无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/glp-1-drugs-may-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-of-leask-of-leukemia-and-lymphoma-in-phoma-in-type-2-diabetes-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/glp-1-drugs-may-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-of-leukemia-and-lymphoma-in-phoma-in-type-2-diabetes-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6862fe90-8e2b-43d7-86f2-42c0e3fb83fb83ef Sun, 09 Mar 2025 21:33:00 -0400 GLP-1 drugs may cut risk of leukemia and lymphoma in type 2 diabetes patients
